Package com.appscend.media.renderers.exoPlayerRenderers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExoPlayerInterface.CaptionListener
    A listener for receiving notifications of timed text.
    ExoPlayerInterface.Id3MetadataListener
    A listener for receiving ID3 metadata parsed from the media stream.
    ExoPlayerInterface.InfoListener
    A listener for debugging information.
    ExoPlayerInterface.InternalErrorListener
    A listener for internal errors.
    ExoPlayerInterface.Listener
    A listener for core events.
    ExoPlayerInterface.RendererBuilder
    Builds renderers for the player.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DashRendererBuilder
    A ExoPlayerInterface.RendererBuilder for DASH.
    DemoUtil
    Utility methods for the demo application.
    EventLogger
    Logs player events using Log.
    ExoPlayerInterface
    A wrapper around ExoPlayer that provides a higher level interface.
    ExtractorRendererBuilder
    A ExoPlayerInterface.RendererBuilder for streams that can be read using an Extractor.
    HlsRendererBuilder
    A ExoPlayerInterface.RendererBuilder for HLS.
    HttpSampleSource  
    HttpSampleSourceReader
    Created by Andrei Marinescu on 20.07.2015.
    PlayerView
    Created on 1/11/16.
    SmoothStreamingRendererBuilder
    A ExoPlayerInterface.RendererBuilder for SmoothStreaming.
    SmoothStreamingTestMediaDrmCallback
    Demo StreamingDrmSessionManager for smooth streaming test content.
    SrtTrackRendererBuilder
    Created by Andrei Marinescu on 20.07.2015.
    WidevineTestMediaDrmCallback
    A MediaDrmCallback for Widevine test content.
